about_the_game:
Unleash the power of legends with this exclusive DLC! The Legendary Arsenal pack brings 5 iconic weapons inspired by the greatest heroes and worlds. Whether you’re slicing, dicing, or blasting your way through orders, these weapons will make you the star of the culinary battlefield.

Features:

  • 5 unique and over-the-top weapons to transform your gameplay.

  • Designs inspired by legendary franchises and unforgettable classics.

  • Perfect for players looking to cook with a side of chaos and flair!

Gear up and show those monsters who's boss—Legendary Arsenal is here to make every meal legendary!
detailed_description:
Unleash the power of legends with this exclusive DLC! The Legendary Arsenal pack brings 5 iconic weapons inspired by the greatest heroes and worlds. Whether you’re slicing, dicing, or blasting your way through orders, these weapons will make you the star of the culinary battlefield.

Features:

  • Perfect for players looking to cook with a side of chaos and flair!

Gear up and show those monsters who's boss—Legendary Arsenal is here to make every meal legendary!
name: Monster Meals - Legendary Arsenal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Equip yourself with 5 epic weapons inspired by legends! Slice, dice, and blast your way through orders in ultimate style. Cook like a hero—make every meal legendary!
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese*, English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
